name: Dice Towah
description:
You've built up a pretty big debt at the craps table. But Big Tommy Beluga has a proposition for ya. Get him off this planet and he can, uh, take care of it. Nuttin' to worry about chief, just get it done.

Controls:

Click and drag to move dice. Mouse wheel or W/S or Up/Down arrows to scroll.

Build your Dice Towah high enough to reach the next planet to win. You need to hit 180m

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022

Literally everything done by one guy, me, Bosco. Music, Code, art, sfx, moral support.

Dice towers are fun to build, so i thought I'd make a dice tower game. And then I figured Tower, Tower defence, sure why not. And that's why you shoot aliens
